inclusion.criterion: age 18 years or older and endorsing either suicidal ideation upon admission or within the last 7 days, or endorsing (or otherwise documented) suicidal behavior within the past 14 days before admission; OR age 18 years or older and undergoing alcohol detoxification
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: presence of a primary psychotic disorder diagnosis on admission; or major depressive disorder with psychosis, or current hallucinations or ideas of reference
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: prisoner (of federal, state, or local authorities)
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient is a 55-year-old man who was recently diagnosed with Parkinson's disease. He lives with his wife and has three children.
